thread.title: Keanu Reeves attend screening of John Wick in London | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Keanu Reeves attend screening of John Wick in London | Daily Mail Online

author: Jessica Rach For Mailonline
title: Keanu Reeves attend screening of John Wick in London | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 14 shares And adding a pair of quirky tan trainers, he left his shoulder-length hair loose, showing off a grown-out beard. Keanu plays the role of John Wick, a continuation of the original story based on a grieving husband who is forced to return to his past as a brutal assassin following the death of his wife. Turning heads: The Matrix actor, 52, put on a suave appearance in a navy suit as he posed ahead of the event Meanwhile the Canadian American actor has revealed his love of motorbikes. But Keanu has admitted he is more 'prudent' when it comes to riding his motorcycle now that he's older. The actor has been an avid fan of motorcycles since he was 22, and admits his age, coupled with a variety of nasty injuries has meant he now takes more care when he dons his helmet. Dapper: Teaming his smart two-piece suit with a black zip-up cardigan, he displayed his toned physique Suave: Adding a pair of quirky tan trainers, he left his shoulder-length hair loose, showing off a grown-out beard as he posed alongside Chad Stahelski When asked how fast he rides his motorcycle, he admitted: 'When I was younger I went very fast. Now I'm getting older and I've had some crashes. I broke some teeth. I burst my spleen and I was in the hospital for a week. I broke my ankle. But everything's okay. 'Now that I'm older I'm more prudent but sometimes I still go fast. I go to the race track. I love it.' And The Matrix actor says his love for riding motorcycles - which led him to start his own motorcycle company Arch Motorcycle - comes as he developed a passion for the 'sense of freedom' that the high speeds gave him. Brave: American stuntman and film director Chad looked suave in an all-black ensemble and leather jacket He said on stage at the Sanremo Music Festival: 'I started riding motorcycles when I was 22 and I loved it. It was something that had a sense of freedom. The wind, the air, the sound. I fell in love and so I started a motorcycle company, Arch Motorcycle. Yeah I ride my motorcycle every day.' It's not the first time the Point Break star has gushed about his love for riding either, as in 2015 he was offered the chance to ride his own custom bike on the Suzuka race track in Japan, which he described as 'incredible'. He said at the time: '[It was] like the best dream you could possibly have ... Incredible ... Just a real honour and something that I could never imagine in my life, to be here and to be riding a motorcycle with my partner and the designer of the motorcycle that I love is very special.' Keanu plays the role of John Wick, a continuation of the original story based on a grieving husband who is forced to return to his past as a brutal assassin following the death of his wife Share or comment on this article 14
